text: 12.18 Part 5 recognises that the borough has a duty to support the development of housing that meets the needs of disabled and vulnerable residents and the Gypsy and Traveller communities. Part 5(a) considers specialist housing which meets the needs of disabled and vulnerable residents and how such developments should be integrated into the wider area through careful design and the sharing/joint use of facilities thus encouraging a sense of community belonging and social Tower Hamlets Local Plan 77 HOMES FOR THE COMMUNITY interaction, where applicable.
